short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Best productivity tool for Business Development and Sales Teams which use WhatsApp Web for work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Weka is a CRM to organize your WhatsApp web. Create labels to organize chats, quick replies, schedule messages, add chat notes and reminders, import contacts to labels, export contacts from labels, and start a chat without saving a number as a contact. Weka is available in 6 languages English, Português, Español, Bahasa, Arabic, and Chinese. 

Weka é um CRM para organizar seu WhatsApp web. Crie marcadores para organizar bate-papos, respostas rápidas, agendar mensagens, adicionar notas e lembretes de bate-papo, importar contatos para marcadores, exportar contatos de marcadores e iniciar um bate-papo sem salvar um número como contato. Weka está disponível em 6 idiomas: inglês, português, espanhol, bahasa, árabe e chinês.

Weka es un CRM para organizar tu web de WhatsApp. Cree etiquetas para organizar chats, respuestas rápidas, programar mensajes, agregar notas y recordatorios de chat, importar contactos a etiquetas, exportar contactos desde etiquetas e iniciar un chat sin guardar un número como contacto. Weka está disponible en 6 idiomas: inglés, portugués, español, bahasa, árabe y chino.

Weka is easy to use, anyone can install and start using Weka in one minute. You don't need difficult CRMs and software anymore. Weka offers a top-notch product and great customer service, earning an impressive 4.8 out of 5 rating in the Google Chrome Store.

FEATURES: 🌟
───────────────────────────────────
- Default tabs: Unread, Needs reply, Groups
- Inbox zero: Achieve Inbox Zero using Inbox and Closed tabs
- Create Custom tabs to organize your chats
- Add Chat notes to any chat to store your comments, summaries, or observations.
- Quick Replies with attachments 
- Schedule Messages with attachments, and see the delivery status
- Set Reminders for followups 
- Use in your native language (English, Portuguese, Spanish, Arabic, Bahasa Indonesia)
- Start a chat with unsaved numbers 
- Broadcast to custom tabs, and see success/failure summary
- Import contacts into your WhatsApp and add them to labels
- Export contacts from your labels
- Use in multiple devices and save money

YOUR PRIVACY, OUR PROMISE 🤝🔒
───────────────────────────────────
At Weka, we are deeply committed to protecting your privacy. Your chat data remains strictly confined to your computer. WE DO NOT COLLECT ANY CHAT DATA. You can trust that your data is secure and will never be shared or sold to third parties.

- Passed Google Chrome Security Audit 
- Featured by Google Chrome Store

We value your privacy as much as you do and will only contact you if you grant us explicit permission. With our 100% privacy-safe extension, you can enjoy peace of mind, knowing your information is in good hands. 🛡️

The permission requested on Google Chrome during the installation of Weka is misleading, and far from the needs of the extension. Explanation: Read your browsing history: Required to detect whether an active WhatsApp session exists among the tabs you are browsing for one click to open chat in the reminder window. This is the "tab" permission from the Chrome Developer Guide, which DOES NOT allow the extension to read your browsing history. It only allows the extension to know what tabs are open right now.
